articles.title: Pelosi condemns Azerbaijan's attacks on Armenia - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi on Sunday strongly condemned what she said were "illegal" border attacks by Azerbaijan on Armenia, using a visit to the Russian ally to pledge American support for its sovereignty.
articles.content: TBILISI, Sept 18 (Reuters) - U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi on Sunday strongly condemned what she said were "illegal" border attacks by Azerbaijan on Armenia, using a visit to the… [+4469 chars]

articles.title: At Scientific American: Webb Is Breaking the Big Bang Paradigm - Walter Bradley Center for Natural and Artificial Intelligence
articles.description: The Big Bang as a basic concept will doubtless survive. But much “settled science” seems to be getting a, perhaps needed, shakeup.
articles.content: Last weekend, we said whatever one thinks about the Big Bang, it was evident that the James Webb Space Telescope had shaken up astronopmy. At Scientific American, science writer JonathanOCallaghan se… [+3814 chars]

articles.title: Sacheen Littlefeather receives apology at Academy event 49 years after Marlon Brando's Oscars protest - CBC News

articles.title: Ramaphosa vows to improve investment environment for US companies after talks with Biden - News24
articles.description: There was agreement on the need to create a more attractive environment for American companies to invest in South Africa.
articles.content:
